Does DuckDuckGo make a browser? - DuckDuckGo Help Pages

duckduckgo.com/duckduckgo-help-pages/get-duckduckgo/does-duckduckgo-make-a-browser
How To Get DuckDuckGo Does DuckDuckGo make a browser? Yes, the DuckDuckGo Browser for Mac, Windows, iOS, and Android is an alternative to Google Chrome and other browsers that lets you take back control of your personal information. Every day, millions of people choose DuckDuckGo over Chrome and other browsers to search and browse online.
